meanings.definition: A tissue or organ transplanted from a donor of the same species.
meanings.sent1: The doctor performed a homograft to replace the damaged heart valve.
meanings.sent2: The homograft kidney saved the patient's life.
meanings.sent3: The homograft transplant was so successful, it's like the body got a new lease on life!
meanings.sent4: Her skin felt like a homograft, seamlessly blending in with her own.
meanings.sent5: The homograft was a perfect match, like a puzzle piece fitting perfectly.

meanings.definition: To transplant a tissue or organ from a donor of the same species.
meanings.sent1: The surgeon will homograft the healthy liver into the patient.
meanings.sent2: They decided to homograft the cornea to restore vision.
meanings.sent3: I homografted the plant from one pot to another, hoping it would thrive better.
meanings.sent4: She homografted her love for music into her children, who now play instruments with passion.
meanings.sent5: The artist homografted different styles to create a unique masterpiece.
